attributes.action: Let Secondary School Students Become Paperless
attributes.background: I feel it will be better for students and the planet if we don’t use paper for everything as so many trees get cut down and wasted by this.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be a decision for the school or local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise this issue with your local school. You could also raise it with a local councillor, who represents you. 

You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
